title: What do we do ? We got a title loan against our vehicle. They donâ€™t want it back how do we get rid of it cant sell without titl?
question: Lien was included in bankruptcy but they dont want it back nor do we have title and cant donate or sell without title
answers: If they do not want the car then they should return the title to you, otherwise you may be stuck. What do they say when you ask for the title? In cases I have worked on with a similar situation I ask for the title to be returned and the company returns it since they do not wish to repossess the car.

If they do not want the car then they should return the title to you, otherwise you may be stuck. What do they say when you ask for the title? In cases I have worked on with a similar situation I ask for the title to be returned and the company returns it since they do not wish to repossess the car.
